AboutSection.title: About me
AboutSection.text: Greetings! I'm Arthur aka Dev.AI, step into my world of web development, where my unwavering belief in the power of hard work fuels every project I undertake. I've learned that dedication and perseverance are the keys to success in programming.

ProjectsSection.title: Meus Projetos
ProjectsSection.firstphrase: 'Nothing is impossible with a little hard work.

projects.1_description: This project was made with the joy to share my love for the LOTR, all the things have been change because of it.
projects.2_description: This project is a AI summarize it take url articles and summarize for you in a simple way then you can understand. This project use OpenAI ChatGPT-4 to make work.
projects.3_description: This was a conclusion project that I made for the end of the Generation Brazil  Bootcamp. It's not working anymore, but the github explanation still great.
projects.4_description: This project was made to learn Next 14 server side with server actions, Infinite Scroll & framer motion animations.
